contenttemplated:
[{"content":"

Right now, the place to buy stock in Fiat-Chrysler is in Milan, Italy. But Bloomberg is reporting that Fiat's boss is about to ask his board to move its primary stock business to the New York Stock Exchange. The BBC's Caroline Hepker covers Fiat-Chrysler, and tells Marketplace Morning Report about the potential move. Click the audio player above to learn more.

","type":"text/html"}]
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, January 23, 2014
description: The company could be moving to the New York Stock Exchange.
teaser: The company could be moving to the New York Stock Exchange.
title: Arrivederci, Milan! Fiat-Chrysler coming to the NYSE?
contentencoded: Right now, the place to buy stock in Fiat-Chrysler is in Milan, Italy. But Bloomberg is reporting that Fiat's boss is about to ask his board to move its primary stock business to the New York Stock Exchange. The BBC's Caroline Hepker covers Fiat-Chrysler, and tells Marketplace Morning Report about the potential move. Click the audio player above to learn more.
